description:
If you use the NYC Subway you'll want this app.
Find the nearest New York City Subway Station from your location.  
See the subway lines at that stop. No internet connection required. 
Direct link to Google Maps & directions to that subway station from your present location (internet connection required).  
Links directly to TMaps-NY FREE subway map application to get official New York mta maps on your phone with no internet connection.  
*** Bonus **** Includes over 55 NYC attractions and the closest subway station to those attractions.  

** DOUBLE BONUS ** 
Includes over 30 NYC Colleges.
  
*** TRIPLE BONUS JUST ADDED ***
Direct link to NYC Weather (internet required)

If you live, work, go to school or occasionally visit the Big Apple, you'll be glad you have this app on your phone.  Easy to use and very convenient. 

 Email any comments or suggestions to Support@GeezerNetwork.com.
